name: webextension-container-scheme
description: Open external links in specific Firefox containers using custom protocol handlers

scripts.lint: web-ext lint --source-dir=src && eslint --config build/.eslintrc.json --ignore-pattern src/tests/lib src
scripts.test: echo 'Open src/tests/unit.html in Firefox to run tests'
scripts.publish:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const changelog=fs.readFileSync('CHANGELOG.md','utf8'); const sections=changelog.split(/## \[/); const firstSection=sections[1]; const match=firstSection?firstSection.split(/
(?=## )/)[0]:''; const lines=match.split('
').slice(1); const notes=lines.join('
').trim(); fs.writeFileSync('.amo-metadata.json', JSON.stringify({release_notes:{en:notes}}, null, 2));" && web-ext sign --channel=listed --upload-source-code --amo-metadata=.amo-metadata.json --source-dir=src
scripts.publish:help: echo 'To publish: 1) Get API credentials from https://addons.mozilla.org/developers/addon/api/key/ 2) Set WEB_EXT_API_KEY and WEB_EXT_API_SECRET env vars 3) Run: npm run publish'
scripts.version:
node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const manifest=require('./src/manifest.json'); manifest.version=pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./src/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '
'); const fs=require('fs'); const changelog=fs.readFileSync('CHANGELOG.md','utf8'); const today=new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; const newEntry='## ['+pkg.version+'] - '+today+'

### Changed
- Version bump

'; const headerMatch=changelog.match(/(# Changelog[\s\S]*?

)(?=## \[)/); if(headerMatch) { const header=headerMatch[1]; const rest=changelog.substring(headerMatch.index + headerMatch[1].length); const updated=header+newEntry+rest; fs.writeFileSync('CHANGELOG.md', updated); } else { console.error('Could not find changelog header'); } console.log('Updated manifest.json and CHANGELOG.md to version', pkg.version);" && git add src/manifest.json CHANGELOG.md
